columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the sql database.

columns.name: account_name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the database account in which the database is created.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a sql database uniquely.

columns.name: autoscale_settings_max_throughput
columns.description: Contains maximum throughput, the resource can scale up to.

columns.name: database_colls
columns.description: A system generated property that specified the addressable path of the collections resource.

columns.name: database_etag
columns.description: A system generated property representing the resource etag required for optimistic concurrency control.

columns.name: database_id
columns.description: Name of the Cosmos DB SQL database.

columns.name: database_rid
columns.description: A system generated unique identifier for database.

columns.name: database_ts
columns.description: A system generated property that denotes the last updated timestamp of the resource.

columns.name: database_users
columns.description: A system generated property that specifies the addressable path of the users resource.

columns.name: throughput
columns.description: Contains the value of the Cosmos DB resource throughput or autoscaleSettings.
